能夠發展資訊科技融入教學的實施策略或方案，並從學生、教師、機會及設備等面向評估其成效

syllabus:
（建議曾修過 資訊科技融入教學導論 者選修）

This course discusses the implementation and evaluation of integrating information and communication technologies (ICT) into a variety of learning contexts. Students will be able to identify the potential of ICT integration, analyze research in ICT integration, evaluate the effectiveness of ICT integration, and criticize ICT integration plans/programs.

The content focuses on the following:

1.  Technology Integration Planning Model (TIP)
2.  ICT characteristics, integration, and impact
3.  Varied strategies of ICT integration
4.  Evaluation regarding implementation outcomes  
    (on individual, group, and program level)
5.  Quantitative and qualitative methods
6.  Analyzing and documenting evaluation
7.  Hybrid designs in implementation research

grading.note: Oral reports with 10-15 slides on project progress
